name: Geonite: Coin Thief
description:
This game was made for the unfinished gamejam, btw, this is my first gamejam I participated in.

Here is the Source code of the whole game on Github: https://github.com/WarlockGames12/GeoniteGameJam/tree/master/Geonite

Objective of the Game: You play as a thief trying to get coins of the monsters that are protecting it, after getting all the coins inside of the level, you can proceed through a door.

Controls: 

-A = Left

-D = Right

-Space = Jump

-Esc = Pause Menu
